Text.Page:
I need your help, . We're struggling to hold the Skyfields and could use a good soldier's aid.

Head to the Skyfields and kill {@LinkCreature:45#4002#argonomorph tuwangis}, {@LinkCreature:45#4003#warfroggers}, and {@LinkCreature:45#4004#wendigos}.

Report to Lyndel at Camp Insanity when your mission is complete.}
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
